title: Paddington Pooper: Bizarre video of man in cape reenacting Roxy's Jacenko's female poo jogger
text:
Bizarre CCTV footage has emerged of the moment a caped prankster reenacted Roxy Jacenko's poo jogger incident outside the celebrity publicist's office.

The prank was discovered by a member of staff at Roxy's office in Watson Street, Sydney, just days after she shared the original footage on Instagram.

But thankfully, unlike the real 'Paddington Pooper', all the prankster left behind was a replica.

The CCTV was unearthed by a member of staff at Roxy's office after they found the prop on the ground early one morning.

Perplexed, they looked through CCTV from the previous night and uncovered the bizarre scenes.

The man dressed in shorts, trainers, and a long, sequinned kimono, parked up in an SUV nearby before he ran up to the office.

Bizarre! The man dressed in shorts, trainers, and a long, sequinned kimono, parked up in an SUV nearby before he ran up to the office

In the video, he is seen excitedly prancing into the shot before he checked the coast was clear from both directions.

He then took a deep squat as he fiddled with the back of his shorts and moments later, the toy dropped to the ground.

After depositing his props, the man looked behind him to make sure he hadn't been spotted.

Seemingly pleased with himself, he then jumped in air, before sprinting out of the shot.

Cashing in! Roxy Jacenko (pictured) shared a video of herself standing next to an assistant dressed in a poo emoji costume, as she recommended the fibre supplement Metamucil

The strange footage comes after reports Roxy has tracked down the female jogger who was caught on CCTV defecating outside her office earlier this month.

The 'Paddington Pooper' saga was featured on A Current Affair and concluded with host Tracy Grimshaw telling viewers the mystery blonde has been identified - but her name has yet to be made public.

Roxy's now deleted footage went viral last week as the incident made headlines across Australia, New Zealand and the UK.
description: Bizarre CCTV footage has emerged of the moment a caped crusader reenacted the poo jogger incident outside the office of Roxy Jacenko (pictured).
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
